txt.en: 'I will tell you the truth, friend:  the Rohirrim do not like to come to this land. There were often Orcs on the far side of the river, and small parties of the villains would cross in order to steal horses from the Mark. Something has brought them across in far greater numbers in the past few days; I know not what.\n\nIt has not improved my opinion of the place.'
What can you tell me of this land?
